response.overview: After kidnapping a little girl to sell her, two sisters face a new chaos when their youngest sibling believes the girl is her birthday present. The eldest tries to take the “gift” back, while the middle sister stops her to protect the youngest’s happiness. But behind that innocence lies growing tension — and darkness waiting to unfold.
response.tagline: A “doll” that was never meant to be owned
response.title: Jangan Ambil Bonekaku..!! 2
